forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. Southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, this afternoon unfolds under a blanket of mostly sunny skies, the warmth of the day kissed by a gentle southwestern breeze that dances through the streets. With temperatures nearing a comfortable 65 degrees, there's a clarity to the air that enhances the colors of the city, making the iconic landmarks stand out vividly. The edges of the marine layer linger, teasing the hills, but for now, the city is aglow, inviting a stroll through bustling neighborhoods or perhaps a leisurely coffee at a sidewalk café where one might savor the simple pleasure of the moment.

As evening approaches, the sky will transition to partly cloudy, with the temperature dropping to around 57 degrees—a gentle reminder that while summer in the Bay Area can be warm, the coast tends to hold on to its cool charm. A light jacket or a cozy sweater will be your companion for a sunset walk along the waterfront, where the fading light glimmers off the bay, offering a serene close to the day. With the pleasant conditions, it’s an ideal time to explore local art galleries or indulge in some quiet reflection in one of the city’s many parks—a perfectly mundane way to embrace the beauty of life in this remarkable place.
